name: Broomstick
description:
Clean all the things! ... and use the Back-button to exit full screen mode.

To reset the room, walk out of the door.

Movement controls:

  • Touch screen: swipe
  • Mouse: click and drag
  • Keyboard: WASD or arrow keys

We made Broomstick in 48 hours  for GMTK 2020 GameJam. Joni has been creating his own web-based tools for some time, while this is Pauliina's first time fidgeting with actual code.

We are quite pleased with the results! We learned a lot and now have a small army of dust bunnies and water babies to play with in the future.
